original_title: 「青春」を奪われた制服美少女23名の性感開発日記89ページ
overview: "I can't go back to the pure us of those days." The innocent hearts and bodies of 23 beautiful girls in uniform are polluted by greedy males. Classrooms, gymnasiums, health rooms, school trips ... 89 corners where every sanctuary is eroded by greed. There is no doubt that the crotch will ache while feeling immoral in the pure white uniform and 480 minutes when the discipline is disturbed. Say goodbye to the fragile and ephemeral "youth" that I thought would last forever.
title: The Sexual Journal Of 23 Hot School Girls Who Lost Their Adolescence, 89 Pages
